title: How it feels when your main gets nerfed

replies.body:
Well, good luck for you. I have an actual image of one of those people complaining to Rito.

https://67.media.tumblr.com/6ae6d5d1e96ae3b25edb91ce95d38666/tumblr_mlkf0pWOiX1s0x8bxo1_500.gif

And Rito is like:

http://popcrush.com/files/2013/02/kanye.gif

I thought riot was too busy being like:

http://img.memecdn.com/the-feeling-when-you-get-money_o_503510.gif
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/ba/ba7ba20059b4e30ad79d34d731977843e91cc8a92b94cf5c3bf649a95440e333.jpg
Wait, I'm confused. What did he do that was grammatically incorrect?

He changed it after I posted the pic. 

When I posted the pic "busy" was "bust"
That isn't grammar...it would be spelling....
http://m.memegen.com/d01lzu.jpg
It is not grammar it is spelling.

You know, most buffs/nerfs are actually too small to make a difference, but because of the psychology behind believing it _does_ make a difference, your winrate with them will actually increase/decrease accordingly simply because you believe it matters.

https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7TKxI2n0676LgERq/giphy.gif
There is a point to this. But there is a moment when it's not enough.

It's kind of like the Placebo effect, except less involving medicine.

######The Placebo effect is basically if I gave you a tiny piece of chalk and convinced you it was a pill that cured cold symptoms and you took it, you would actually feel better about your cold.
I know how the placebo effect works dude.
#Well how am I supposed to know?!
I think most people do know about it, so I'd say it's better to assume people do than do not.  If they don't know, they can always google it.
It's the Interenet, people don't know how to use Google. Why do you think www.lmgtfy.com exists?

{{champion:11}} https://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?&id=OIP.Mdeaf244d78134dc677f84418f70d69beo0&w=300&h=243&c=0&pid=1.9&rs=0&p=0&r=0&url=http%3A%2F%2Fbroadwayworld.com%2Fboard%2Freadmessage.php%3Fthread%3D1059941%26page%3D5%26mobile%3Don
rito pls
get ready, here comes the: "if u main them u should be good enough to deal with the nerf"
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder640/500x/60692640.jpg
Me with Kog'Maw right now... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

{{champion:31}} Once a year a horrible, HORRIBLE nerf appears for him on the PBE, and I squirm and cry for a whole patch, and then it gets removed from the PBE and life goes on as usual.

It's scary.
{{champion:102}} {{item:3070}}   Please be gentle rito
